# Customizing scrollbar thumb color in settings (2025-11-30 16:29Z)

_**User (2025-11-30 16:30Z)**_

On the All Series page the thumb of the scroll bar on the right hand side is very dark. Can you show me where the color setting is for the thumb?

---

_**Agent (model copilot/auto)**_

The scrollbar thumb is controlled by workbench color tokens (scrollbarSlider.*). Update them in your user settings.

1. Open Settings (JSON) â€” use Preferences: Open User Settings.
2. Add/modify workbench.colorCustomizations with these tokens: scrollbarSlider.background, scrollbarSlider.hoverBackground, scrollbarSlider.activeBackground.
3. Save; changes apply immediately.
